title: Could someone please help me identify this font?
content:
Hello all,

Would someone be able to identify this title font for me (i.e., the font in which "GAME OF CAGES" has been written? It is used on the cover for the first couple of novels in the Twenty Palaces series by Harry Connolly.

Neither WhatTheFont nor Identifont yielded any results, so I am hoping that someone here has seen this font before or can help me identify it.

Thanks either way!

- Robert

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018083320im_/http:/farm5.static.flickr.com/4032/4257904825_e06893bce7_m.jpg) Cover - Game of Cages
author: rdcoll

comments.content:
Patented by John F. Cumming in 1884 and sold by the Boston Type Foundry as Rubens. Various digital available including [Rubens](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018083320/http:/www.fonthaus.com/fonts/woodentype/rubens/wo10153).  
Don

Wow! Thanks Don for the speedy reply! I really appreciate it.

- Robert
